# Exercise 2.5: Determine the type of each of the following literals. Explain the differences among the literals in each of the four examples:    (a) ’a’     char literal        L’a’    wchar_t literal        "a"     string literal        L"a"    wchar_t literal    (b) 10      decimal literal signed        10u     unsigned        10L     long        10uL    unsigned long        012     octal        0xC     hexa decimal    (c) 3.14    double        3.14f   float        3.14L   long double            (d) 10      decimal literal signed        10u     unsigned decimal literal        10.     double        10e-2   double
